title: [Cancer] Australian researchers have engineered bacteria that can be used to detect bowel cancer faster and replace existing at-home stool tests. The bacteria successfully detected colorectal tumors in mice, and could be used to screen for hard-to-detect cancers like pancreatic cancer in future.
